steps.title: Draw a large circle for the head.
steps.content: Draw a large circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw a vertical line at the center of the circle.
steps.content: Draw a vertical line at the center of the circle. Add two parallel horizontal lines on the lower half of the circle, intersecting the center vertical line.

steps.title: Draw a curved V below the circle.
steps.content: Draw a curved V below the circle. Use this as a guide for her chin and cheeks. Extend the center vertical line on to this.

steps.title: Draw a pair of circles that will serve as her eyes between the two horizontal lines.
steps.content: Draw a pair of circles that will serve as her eyes between the two horizontal lines.

steps.title: Add a vertical oval as her neck.
steps.content: Add a vertical oval as her neck. Place below the "chin and cheeks". Add a large curve line across the intersection of the neck and the chin to serve as her shoulders.

steps.title: Add half a circle or an upside-down U-shape on the two ends of the large curve line (shoulders).
steps.content: Add half a circle or an upside-down U-shape on the two ends of the large curve line (shoulders).

steps.title: Draw her hair by making long strokes of slightly curved lines.
steps.content: Draw her hair by making long strokes of slightly curved lines. It may be easier to imagine the hair as a whole before doing so.

steps.title: Continue tracing Hatsune's facial outline and hair.
steps.content: Continue tracing Hatsune's facial outline and hair. Add details on her eyes, mouth, clothing, etc.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw lines that will serve as guide to her body and limbs.
steps.content: Draw lines that will serve as guide to her body and limbs. Use little circles for her joints. Also, trace a pair of long lines going down from both sides of the head-circle as a guide to her flowing hair.

steps.title: Start tracing the outline of Hatsune's head, body and hair, using these skelton of lines.
steps.content: Start tracing the outline of Hatsune's head, body and hair, using these skelton of lines . Remember that she has a structure of a pre-teen.

steps.title: Add body and face details.
steps.content: Add body and face details. Draw her clothing details.
